description: Sandbox configuration file. Note 'dw.json' should be placed in root of cartridges

password.description: User's password (will be asked if empty)

client-id.description: Client id for On-Demand Sandbox API

client-secret.description: Client secret for On-Demand Sandbox API

code-version.description: Version of code. Note: code version should exist before can be uploaded

version.description: Version of code. Note: code version should exist before can be uploaded

cartridge.description: List of cartridges. If empty than all subdirectory of current directory is treated as cartridges and will be uploaded

cartridgesPath.description: List of cartridges, which is in the site cartridges path separated by ':', example: "app_site:plugin_newsletter:plugin_sitemap:plugin_wishlists:app_storefront_base"

cartridgeResolution.description: Leaves all the cartridges instead of asking
